AmazonS3::get_logs ( $  bucket  ) 

Get Logs

Get the access logs associated with a given bucket.

public

Parameters:
string $bucket (Required) The name of the bucket to be used. Pass null if using AmazonS3::set_vhost().
Returns:
TarzanHTTPResponse
See also:
http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AmazonS3/2006-03-01/index.html?ServerLogs.html
